sys_ux_client_script.name: Related item page redirection

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_14c1c285626531108cf9b80968ffbd93
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">1cc1c285b6653110a3e7a282fb6094a3</macroponent><name>Related item page redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;

    if (state.relatedItemSysId) {
        api.setState("relatedItemSysId", "");
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route: "catalog",
            fields: {
                "sysId": data.look_up_record_1.result.related_sc_cat_item.value
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-26 09:51:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>14c1c285626531108cf9b80968ffbd93</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Related item page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LOS POC" source="x_1070677_los_po_0">7a4dccfc4761311077acc7de826d43c1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LOS POC">7a4dccfc4761311077acc7de826d43c1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_14c1c285626531108cf9b80968ffbd93</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-26 09:51:34</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
